content: CFS-BL Firestop Block Preformed firestop blocks for sealing penetrations with cables ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop blocks, plugs, or cushions- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to install – no special tools required High-productivity, one-sided, one-person installation Dust-, fiber-, halogen- and solvent-free Integrated grid technology reduces the use of wire mesh/cover plates making installation of the firestop block faster and cleaner Applications Temporary or permanent sealing of cables, cable trays and pipes in wall and floor openings Cables and cable trays Floors and walls Concrete, CMU, gypsum For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 8 x 5 x 2 in LEED VOC: 5 g/l Application temperature range: 40 - 104 °F Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 8 x 5 x 2 in | LEED VOC | 5 g/l | Storage and transportation temperature range | 32 - 104 °F | Application temperature range | 40 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2030020 - Firestop block CFS-BL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-BL Firestop block - 3484119 - Firestop block CFS-BL MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 20x CFS-BL Firestop block - 3541548 - CFS-BL Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 480x CFS-BL Firestop block
